name: AffiLinks
author: AffiLinks

sections.description:
Effortlessly manage, track, and optimize affiliate links ðŸ”— and brands ðŸ’¼ with comprehensive analytics ðŸ“ˆ, all within your WordPress site. ðŸš€

How to use

Follow below steps and use it:

  1. Add the “Brand” with affiliate brand name and affiliate program URL
  2. Add the “Link” with your acutal affiliate link, select the brand and set the clocked link
  3. Use the shortcode [aff_link id='{ID}']Content[/aff_link] to display the affiliate link
  4. Also, Add the “Asset” with your acutal affiliate link, select the brand and set the clocked link
  5. Use the shortcode [aff_asset id='{ID}'] to display the affiliate assets.

Read more about the Getting Started guide ðŸ“–

Bug reports

Bug reports for “Affilinks” are welcomed in WordPress support forum.

sections.installation: 1. Install the AffiLinks plugin either via the WordPress plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Improvement: Added new dashboard with the analytics and reports.

1.0.2

  • Improvement: Added the menu, submenu, and documentation links.

1.0.1

  • Improvement: Added WordPress 5.4 compatibility.
  • Improvement: Removed unwanted files and code.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
